1008705767.title: Music Of Dan Asia
1008705767.notes:
Total Time = 63:31

Miles Mix was first performed October 18, 1976 in Sprague Hall, Yale University, New Haven, Connecticut.
Shtay was first performed April 23, 1978 at #1 Sheridan Square, New York, New York.
String Quartet No. 1 was first performed December 6, 1976 in Sprague Hall, Yale University, New Haven, Connecticut, and subsequently recorded there.
Sand II was first performed by Musical Elements October 27, 1979, at Carnegie Recital Hall, New York, New York. The work was recorded at Warner Concert Hall, Oberlin Conservatory of Music, Oberlin, Ohio in December 1982.
Rivalries was first performed March 28, 1982 by the Oberlin Contemporary Chamber Ensemble in Finney Chapel, Oberlin College, Oberlin, Ohio. The work was recorded by the same performers in Warner Concert Hall, Oberlin Conservatory of Music, Oberlin, Ohio.

1010783507.title: Trumpet Evolution
1010783507.notes:
Trumpet Evolution celebrates the influence of a group of musicians to the history of horn playing.  Each of nineteen tracks homages a particular artist.  The order of the tunes is based on the dates of birth of the musicians being paid tribute to.

1. In tribute to Joseph "King" Oliver
2. In tribute to Louis Armstrong
3. In tribute to Bix Beiderbecke
4. In tribute to Rafael Mendez
5. In tribute to Bunny Berigan
6. In tribute to Charles "Cootie" Williams
7. In tribute to Roy Eldredge
8. In tribute to Harry James
9. In tribute to Dizzy Gillespie.  Arrangement based on original 1947 recording.
10. In tribute to Clark Terry
11. In tribute to Timofei Dokshizer
12. In tribute to Theodore "Fats" Navarro
13. In tribute to Miles Davis
14. In tribute to Maynard Ferguson
15. In tribute to Chet Baker
16. In tribute to Clifford Brown
17. In tribute to Maurice Andre
18. In tribute to Freddie Hubbard
19. In tribute to Wynton Marsalis
